moves.1. e4 d6: my own defense that I've worked on for several years--designed to get the queens off and get into an endgame faster than usual. Most players are lost without the queen
moves.2. d4 e5 3. dxe5 dxe5 4. Qxd8+ Kxd8 5. B: I'm taking this idea a bit too far but I have an endgame already.
moves.11. O-O-O Kc7 12. Ngf3 Nd7 13. Nb3 Ne5 1: All of a sudden my pieces are active. Black's minor pieces are doing nothing.
moves.22. Nf5 Ref8 23. Nxg7 Nxe4 24. Rxf8 Rxf8: It's happening like I planned--white has no advantage.
moves.27. Re1 Bd5 28. Nxc5: loses on the spot--had to play Ng5
